name: Crypto Heist
description:
You're itching to buy a new speedboat but your rig is not up to the task of mining crypto. Luckily you have a handy stealth drone and know of a nearby server facility that is ripe for the picking.

Hunt down the terminals to steal all their juicy coins. The deeper you go, the more coins stored on the servers. Make sure to head back to base regularly to bank your coins and upgrade your drone!

Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • E - Interact
  • L&R Mouse - Activate abilities (once unlocked)

Credits

  • Ryan Ayton (ryan_ayton)
  • Max Finch-Bretlaender (zodalia)
  • Pete Brisbourne (Hi_ImTemmy)
  • Music by Multifaros
